channel.title: Drag-Plate v2 of v3
channel.description:
So i posted v1 on silab forums, mopar and rune-server and got lots of feed back. Based on a few ideas and feed back i gave the plate abs in the front and edited the lower ring so it comes around and flattens in the front like the top ring and made the abs. I also added spikes around the wrist area and also added a few more shades of red.
I moved the whole chest and right arm to the left some So the mirrored left arm was touching the plate and not barely touching.
One major thing i need to fix is below the spikes on the wrist area there are lines in wrist guard there and i need to edit that and remove some triangles as theres some that are going through each other and shit. Not sure if you can see it but its clearly visible in the metasequoia program.
So heres the picture please post some feed back and comments and some ideas for v3.
[IMG]http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm71/ravenelscape/d-platev2.jpg[/img]

item.title: Drag-Plate v2 of v3
item.dc:creator: @daniel89 daniel89
item.description:
@daniel89 wrote:

i made the arms and shoulders a seperate model and its still invisible… i think i know what wrong ima have to scratch the whole model and start clean as i based the plate off a npc lmfao yes i said a npc

i just deleted the arms legs head and wings off the npc and start adding and fixing it to what it is now… just only 10 hours gone for nothing

Unless someone has a idea on how to fix this? I might see if cj could fix if he will even talk with me…

Read full topic

item.title: Drag-Plate v2 of v3
item.dc:creator: @daniel89 daniel89
item.description:
@daniel89 wrote:

yeah something is wrong with the plate anyhows cause when i load it into the client the model adds right but when i spawn it it frezzes client or when i edit my char file and place it in the right spot im invisible… so idk whats wrong wit it i think it has to many triangles and shit…

to skully-
I think im gona chop the shoulders up and bring them in some and just build them right into the plate like i did with the abs.

and the abs are dark as the arms it justs light cause of of the lighting thats on it 0o
